data.lyric:
[ti:What Else Can I Do? (From "Encanto"/Soundtrack Version)]
[ar:Diane Guerrero/Stephanie Beatriz]
[al:Encanto (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]What Else Can I Do? (From "Encanto"/Soundtrack Version) - Diane Guerrero/Stephanie Beatriz
[00:00.79]Lyrics by：Lin-Manuel Miranda
[00:01.59]Composed by：Lin-Manuel Miranda
[00:02.38]I just made something unexpected
[00:06.12]Something sharp
[00:08.05]Something new
[00:12.30]It's not symmetrical or perfect
[00:14.54]But it's beautiful
[00:16.26]And it's mine
[00:18.50]What else can I do
[00:20.61]Bring it in bring it in
[00:22.26](Good talk) Bring it in bring it in
[00:23.61]What else can I do
[00:24.61](Let's walk) Bring it in bring it in
[00:26.00](Free hugs) Bring it in bring it in
[00:27.92]I grow rows and rows of roses
[00:32.18]Flor de mayo
[00:33.43]
[00:34.05]By the mile
[00:36.16]I make perfect practiced poses
[00:39.60]
[00:40.36]So much hides behind my smile
[00:43.46]
[00:44.29]What could I do if I just grew what I was feeling in the moment
[00:49.62](Do you know where you're going Whoa)
[00:52.24]What could I do if I just knew it didn't need to be perfect
[00:56.83]It just needed to be
[00:58.73]And they let me be
[01:00.30]A hurricane of jacarandas
[01:02.97]
[01:03.93]Strangling figs (Big)
[01:05.98]Hanging vines (This is fine)
[01:08.17]Palma de cera fills the air as I climb
[01:12.20]And I push through
[01:14.66]What else can I do
[01:16.50]
[01:17.65]Can I deliver us a river of sundew
[01:20.91]
[01:21.52]Careful it's carnivorous a little just won't do
[01:24.65]
[01:25.29]I wanna feel the shiver of something new
[01:29.26]I'm so sick of pretty
[01:30.39]I want something true don't you
[01:32.36]You just seem like your life's been a dream
[01:35.32]Since the moment you opened your eyes
[01:37.92](How far do these roots go down）
[01:40.23]All I know are the blossoms you grow
[01:43.24]But it's awesome to see how you rise
[01:46.19]How far can I rise
[01:48.28]Through the roof to the skies
[01:50.30]Let's go
[01:52.24]A hurricane of jacarandas (Whoo)
[01:55.84]Strangling figs (Go)
[01:57.81]Hanging vines (Grow)
[02:00.09]Palma de cera fills the air as I climb
[02:04.08]And I push through
[02:06.58]What else what else
[02:08.08]What can you do when you are deeply madly truly in the moment
[02:13.16](Seize the moment keep goin')
[02:16.11]What can you do when you know who you wanna be isn't perfect
[02:20.81]But I'll still be okay
[02:22.14]Hey everybody clear the way (Whoo)
[02:24.33]I'm coming through with tabebuia
[02:25.93](She's coming through with that booyah)
[02:28.14]Making waves (Making waves)
[02:29.95]Changing minds (You've changed mine)
[02:32.36]The way is clearer 'cause you're here and well
[02:35.54]I owe this all to you
[02:38.30]What else can I do
[02:40.29]Show 'em what you can do
[02:42.23]What else can I do
[02:44.35]There's nothing you can't do
[02:46.36]What else can I do
data.trans:
[ti:What Else Can I Do? (From "Encanto"/Soundtrack Version)]
[ar:Diane Guerrero/Stephanie Beatriz]
[al:Encanto (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.79]//
[00:01.59]//
[00:02.38]我刚刚创造出一些意想不到的东西
[00:06.12]浑身长满利刺
[00:08.05]非常新奇
[00:12.30]它并并不对称也不完美
[00:14.54]但它却很漂亮
[00:16.26]现在它属于我
[00:18.50]我还能做什么
[00:20.61]让我抱一下 让我抱一下
[00:22.26]说得正好 让我抱一下 让我抱一下
[00:23.61]我还能做什么
[00:24.61]让我们一起漫步吧 让我抱一下 让我抱一下
[00:26.00]自由拥抱 让我抱一下 让我抱一下
[00:27.92]我种下一排排玫瑰
[00:32.18]竞相开放的五月花
[00:33.43]
[00:34.05]绵延不绝
[00:36.16]我摆出熟稔的完美姿势
[00:39.60]
[00:40.36]笑容背后隐藏着太多辛酸坎坷
[00:43.46]
[00:44.29]如果我让此刻的感受肆意滋长 我能做什么
[00:49.62]你是否知道你该何去何从
[00:52.24]如果我知道一切并不需要追求完美 我能做什么
[00:56.83]只需要忠于本心
[00:58.73]他们让我随心所欲
[01:00.30]如飓风般绽放的蓝花楹
[01:02.97]
[01:03.93]盘根错节的绞杀植物 硕大无比
[01:05.98]垂悬而下的藤蔓 这很好
[01:08.17]当我全力以赴向上攀爬时
[01:12.20]空气中弥漫着蜡棕榈树的味道
[01:14.66]我还能做什么
[01:16.50]
[01:17.65]我能否为我们变出一条茅膏菜密布的河流
[01:20.91]
[01:21.52]小心一点 这是食虫植物 千万不要触碰
[01:24.65]
[01:25.29]我渴望感受新鲜事物带来的悸动
[01:29.26]我厌倦了美丽
[01:30.39]我渴望彰显真我 不是吗
[01:32.36]从你睁开双眼的那一刻开始
[01:35.32]你觉得你的人生仿佛是一场梦
[01:37.92]这些根向下扎得有多深
[01:40.23]我只知道你让鲜花盛放
[01:43.24]但看到你不懈进取的样子 真是令人欣慰
[01:46.19]我能取得多少成就
[01:48.28]穿过屋顶 直达天际
[01:50.30]让我们出发吧
[01:52.24]如飓风般绽放的蓝花楹
[01:55.84]盘根错节的绞杀植物 出发
[01:57.81]垂悬而下的藤蔓 茁壮生长
[02:00.09]当我全力以赴向上攀爬时
[02:04.08]空气中弥漫着蜡棕榈树的味道
[02:06.58]还有什么 还有什么
[02:08.08]当你深深地沉迷于这一刻时 你能做什么
[02:13.16]把握时机 勇往直前
[02:16.11]当你知道你心驰神往的目标并不完美时 你能做什么
[02:20.81]但我还是会安然无恙的
[02:22.14]嘿 大家都让开吧
[02:24.33]我召唤绚烂的风铃木 渡过重重难关
[02:25.93]她带来惊喜 渡过重重难关
[02:28.14]引发轰动 引发轰动
[02:29.95]改变心意 你已经让我改变心意
[02:32.36]因为你陪在我身边 前方的路变得更清晰
[02:35.54]这一切都要感谢你
[02:38.30]我还能做什么
[02:40.29]让他们见识一下你的真本领
[02:42.23]我还能做什么
[02:44.35]你无所不能
[02:46.36]我还能做什么
